document_data.name: The Internal Structure of the Brachiopod
document_data.author: [[Linnaeus Gozzling]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Internal Structure of the Brachiopod''''' was a natural science book by Professor [[Linnaeus Gozzling]] of the [[University of Suzail]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]]. It was about the [[Wikipedia:Brachiopod|type of mollusc]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}} It had one volume.

A copy was kept in the small [[Ghars library]] managed by [[Phelos Marmwitz]]. The retired [[War Wizard]] and sage [[Benelaius]] borrowed it in the summer of [[1367 DR]] and had his servant [[Jasper (servant)|Jasper]] return it a few weeks later.

A copy was kept in [[Candlekeep]] around [[1372 DR]].
